description:
go: Allow ssh tunnelled schemes of bzr, git and svn.

This is often used in private hosting and collaborating environments.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2594f4a8314e ***

cmd/go: allow ssh tunnelled bzr, git and svn

This is often used in private hosting and collaborating environments.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5753063

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 5753063: go: Allow ssh tunnelled schemes of bzr, git and svn.
